title: Katsute Mahou Shoujo to Aku wa Tekitai shiteita.

synonyms: The Former Magical Girl & Evil Enemy
The Magical Girl and Evil Officer, Beauty and the Beast
alternative_titles.en: The Magical Girl and the Evil Lieutenant Used to Be Archenemies
alternative_titles.ja: かつて魔法少女と悪は敵対していた。

synopsis:
The manga tells the story of Mira, who leads an evil organization trying to take over and destroy everything. Earth is under attack, but a magical girl named Byakuya Mimori stands up to Mira's group. As they face off, something unexpected happens—Mira falls in love with Mimori.

(Source: MAL News)
